name: apartum
tag_list: apartments, accommodation, vacation-rentals, holiday, travel, compare
overview:
apartum is the holiday apartments search engine which makes the task of finding holiday accommodation easier for customers.

apartum automatically connects with holiday apartments agencies across the world and finds available apartments that meet the customer´s criteria. apartum simplifies the search process for tourist rental apartments, giving the customer the opportunity to compare all the available apartments from a variety of agencies at once, on one page and with just one search. The search can also be carried out according to key criteria, including price, location, comments and photos.

apartum offers more than 50 destinations in the best cities across the world, including Rome, Paris, Barcelona, London, Miami, New york, San Francisco, Rio de Janeiro, Buenos Aires and much more.
